name: Physint
summary:
Kojima Productions, in partnership with Sony Interactive Entertainment, during the State of Play presentation on 31 January 2024, announced a new espionage action game for PlayStation.

This new action-espionage game will use cutting-edge technology and a stellar cast to deliver an experience like no other. Blurring the boundaries between film and games, offering near life-like graphics and a new take on interactive entertainment.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: Physint - Hideo Kojima returns to the action-espionage genre | PlayStation
